Misc. Window Grilles, Main Entrance, Gates, Channel Guards, circa 1920s-1930s ; 720 Park Ave., NYC, 1929; Reilly Warehouse, Bergen St., Brooklyn, 1924; John Wanamaker, East 10th St. and Broadway, 1926; Manville Residence, Pleasantville, NY, 1925; Astor Apartments, 40 East 86th St., 1928; Thorn Estate, 37th St. and Sixth Ave., 1921; Lenox Hill Hospital, 76th St. and Lexington Ave., 1930; Gimbel Store, 33rd St., and Broadway, NYC, 1927; Federal Storage Warehouse, Washington, DC, 1925; F.S. Detail at 305 East 61st St., 1924; Biltmore Country Club, Harrison, NY, 1921; Hobart Allport Warehouse, Asheville, NC, 1926; Panhellenic House, East 49th St., NYC, 1927; Broadway Block Building at 51st St., 1929; 510 Park Ave., NYC, 1924; New York University (Bronx location), 1928; Lincoln School of Teachers College, West 123rd St., NYC, 1927
